questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Campfire and wood

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) Setting up a campfire
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) People
B) Buildings
C) Fire and wood
D) Water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) Burning wood
D) A bench

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A cityscape
B) A mountain range
C) Ashes and smoke
D) A lake

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Rocks
B) Tree branches and logs
C) Flowers
D) A tent

What relationship can be observed between the elements in the photo?
A) The fire is burning the wood
B) The people are interacting with the fire
C) The water is putting out the fire
D) The animals are near the fire

What kind of wood is depicted in the photo?
A) Freshly cut wood
B) Painted wood
C) Old and dry wood
D) Polished wood

What can be seen around the fire?
A) Water
B) Grass
C) Ashes, wood and small twigs
D) Furniture

A) Just starting
B) Fully blazing
C) Dying out
D) Completely extinguished

A) Building a house
B) Bonfire
C) Planting a tree
D) Cleaning a yard

What is the color of the flames in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) orange
D) Purple

What is the size of the fire in the photo?
A) Very large
B) Medium-sized
C) Small and contained
D) Almost non-existent

What is the primary material being burned in the fire?
A) Paper
B) Plastic
C) Wood
D) Metal

A) Circular
B) Square
C) Triangular
D) Leaned across eachother

What is the main activity shown in the photo?
A) Cooking
B) Hiking
C) Fire building
D) Fishing

A) Wet and muddy
B) Covered in grass
C) Ashy and dry

What is the primary focus of the photo?
A) The surrounding environment
B) The people present
C) The fire and wood
D) The sky

A) Water vapor
B) Smoke
C) Dust
D) Leaves

A) Indoor activity

A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) Yellow

A) Sandy
B) Rocky
C) Ashy
D) Grassy

A) C and D
B) Vertically stacked
C) Leaning against each other
D) Scattered randomly

A) Wet and fresh
B) Dry and cracked
C) Dry and Slightly burned

B) Grass
C) Ashes and small twigs

What is the predominant activity in the photo?

B) Fire building
C) Playing sports
